Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
51 Upādinnaduka, Kusalattika
Upādinnaduka, Kusalattika
60.
168Anupādinnaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
169Anupādinnaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ ekaṃyeva paccayavasena.)
170Mahantaradukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
